data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maruyama, Munetoshi (2012): Termitotrox cupido sp. n. (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae), a new termitophilous scarab species from the Indo-Chinese subregion, associated with Hypotermes termites. ZooKeys 254: 89-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.254.4285, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.254.4285
